review: A nice addition to my recording home studio!  I recommend it for any one who records ballads or light classical music.
I use this everyday.  It has prolonged the life of my equipment and improved the quality of my vocal productions
It took me a while to figure out how to implement this mic.  But with the right equipment it has turned out to be a nice addition to my recording studio.
For the price this product is ideal.  I find myself wishing I had ordered more.  It is perfect for the home studio and is budget friendly.  I shall  probably get three or four more.
For the price it serves as a good resting place for the guitar when not being played.  Well designed and useful.
I am very pleased with the product.  It has performed better than I had expected.  I recommend it highly.  I shall probably order more from this company in the future.
